DOC.detailed_description: About 1000 CEFALY user , device since one year reorder electrode last year , invited participate Internet survey . This survey contain 8 question , data collect completely anonymously . Questions concern use CEFALY migraine attack , number treat attack number type acute anti-migraine drug avoid thanks use CEFALY .
DOC.criteria: Subjects use Cefaly device regularly year identify reorder electrode last year . History likely episodic chronic migraine without aura diagnose physician
